Name: Oriental City food court - Two and a half chilli rated

Content.summary: 'Oriental City food court - Two and a half chilli rated' - a blog post by Darren Ferguson about Oriental City, London, food stalls, food court, Hospitality Recreation written on 16 July 2006
Content.tags: Oriental City, London, food stalls, food court, Hospitality Recreation, Bun Bo Hue, Vietnamese
Content.bodyText:
visited: 15/07/2006

Two and a half chilli rated
Oriental City, 399 Edgware Road, London, NW9 0JJ
http://www.london-eating.co.uk/3082.htm
http://london.openguides.org/index.cgi?id=Oriental_City;oldid=Oriental_City_NW9
Our comment: This is a food court which has all types of Asian cuisine, currently only one offers Pho. We had the Bun Hue, the stock was great, but the beef was very very fatty (is this traditional vietnamese style or not?).

Note: The rating is subject to change as food stalls change ownership on quite a frequent basis.
